title: [SGR CLASSICS] Dark Colony + Council Wars
description:
SLAUGHTER PROUDLY PRESENTS: DARK COLONY + COUNCIL WARS

Type: FULL GAME
Released on May 25th, 2014

Source: ORIGINAL

Packed Size: 209Megs
Requirement Space: 333Megs


Works on XP, Vista, 7 & 8

*NOTE* Always use the desktop shortcut to fix an issue with this when loading.
Seems game erases content in a file & exits back to desktop. The shortcut when you
select DARK COLONY to play (expansion works fine) will fix this issue. If not, keep
trying with the shortcut.


HOW TO PLAY GAME AFTER INSTALL:
-1- Run the executable "PlayGame.exe" from the directory of which you installed to.
Or click the game shortcut on your desktop after installed. This will auto-detect if
extracted correctly and prompt you to play game. Otherwise it will prompt you to install game.

INSTALLER HELP:
NFO = View the NFO file (this)
Music On/Off = Turn music on/off
Exit = Kill Installer


The first release in the PC CLASSIC line from SLAUGHTER.

COMING: XIII, OUTLAWS, STAR WARS REPUBLIC COMMANDO, BREAKNECK RACING, 7 SINS, DARK REIGN,
EARTH AT WAR & WAR OF THE WORLDS
